eu.jangos.auth.network.srp

Class SRPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.jangos.auth.network.srp.SRPServer

  • public class SRPServer
extends Object
    SRPServer is an helper class to handle SRP6 calculation and hashing methods for WoW client since it deviates from the original SRP6 specification..
    Version:
    v0.1 BETA.
    Author:
    Warkdev

      • step2

        public boolean step2(BigNumber A,
                     BigNumber M1)
        Performs the second step of the authentication challenge, verifying that the server knows the information the client has generated.
        Parameters:
        A - The A sent by the client.
        M1 - The proof sent by the client.
        Returns:
        True if the server recognize the proof, false otherwise.

      • generateHashLogonProof

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The Hash Logon Proof.
